title: Roku Requirements: All pre-sales and pre-activation screens need to be accurate and easily followed. The user should have no trouble determining how to link or login to an account
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the Channel
AND navigate throughout the different areas
custom_expected:
THEN all pre-sales and pre-activation screens need to be accurate 
AND all screens should be easily followed
AND the user should have no trouble determining how to link or login to an account

title: Roku Requirements: If the channel has functionality that does not require being logged in or linked (such as a preview mode or only SD videos) it must work properly
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the Channel
AND are not currently logged into an account
custom_expected:
THEN all free content should work as expected
AND all free media content should play without issue

title: Roku Requirements: Linking and/or activation should be functional.
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to link their account to their Roku device
custom_expected: THEN the account links successfully

title: Roku Requirements: Link codes should avoid using easily confused characters like O & 0, I & l. Link codes should not be case sensitive either.
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to link their account
custom_expected:
THEN the code should not be case sensitive
AND the characters will not appear confusing

title: Roku Requirements: Linking or activation must persist after the user has left the channel and must persist through a reboot of the Roku box.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Channel is installed
AND the user has linked their account
custom_steps:
WHEN the Roku box restarts
OR the user has exited the Channel
AND the Channel is re-accessed
custom_expected: THEN the user's account will still be linked following the restart of the Roku device

title: Roku Requirements: If the channel allows users to login to an account (separate from linking) then the user must also be able to log out.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Channel is installed
AND the user has chosen to login an account (not linked)
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to logout
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to locate the logout option
AND the user will be able to logout of their account without issue

title: Roku Requirements: Removing the channel from the Roku should clear all login and linking information. Verify this by removing the application and then re-adding it. You should have to reactivate or relink. If a new user links the same device it shoul
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Channel is installed
AND the user has linked their account
OR the user has logged into an account

DO NOT USE A SIDELOADED BUILD FOR THIS TEST
custom_steps:
WHEN the user uninstalls the Channel
AND the user reinstalls the Channel
custom_expected:
THEN the user will no longer be logged in
NOR will their account be linked
AND the user will need to re-activate/relink their account

title: Roku Requirements: All graphics in the channel should be broadcast safe for TVs (no blooming, crazy contrast, etc.)
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the Channel
AND navigate throughout the different areas
custom_expected: THEN all graphics in the channel should be broadcast safe for TVs

title: Roku Requirements:  All actionable items in the UI should be clickable and selecting them should perform the expected function
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the Channel
AND navigate throughout the different areas
custom_expected:
THEN all actionable items in the UI should be clickable 
AND selecting them should perform the expected function

title: Roku Requirements: All text in the UI should be free of grammatical errors, spelling errors and should not be truncated or covered by other screen elements
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the Channel
AND navigate throughout the different areas
custom_expected:
THEN all text in the UI should be free of grammatical errors, spelling errors 
AND should not be truncated or covered by other screen elements

title: Roku Requirements: Video should be clear of visible defects like pixelation, dropped frames, stuttering, color problems, etc.
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Channel has been installed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the Channel
AND accesses a video stream
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will begin
AND there will be no visible defects (ex: pixelation, dropped frames, stuttering, color problems, etc.)

> REPEAT with all video forms (highlights, live media, archive episodes, etc)

title: Roku Requirements: Video and audio should be in sync
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Channel has been installed
custom_steps:
WHEN the Channel is accessed
AND a video stream is played
custom_expected:
THEN the video and audio playback will be in sync
> REPEAT with all video forms (highlights, live media, archive episodes, etc)

title: Roku Requirements: Audio should be free of audible defects like static, dropouts and popping.
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Channel has been installed
custom_steps:
WHEN the Channel is accessed
AND an Audio stream is played
custom_expected: THEN the Audio Stream will be free of audible defects (ex: static, dropouts and popping)

title: Roku Requirements: Hitting the fast forward button should cause the player to start FF.
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Channel has been installed
custom_steps:
WHEN the Channel is accessed
AND an archived video stream is accessed (NOT LIVE)
AND the user presses the fast forward button
custom_expected: THEN the media should start to fast forward

title: Roku Requirements: All 3 levels of FF should work.
custom_steps:
WHEN the Channel is accessed
AND an archived video stream is played (NOT LIVE)
AND the user presses fast forward multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the fast forward speed should increment accordingly up to the 3 levels

title: Roku Requirements: Once FF has stopped selecting a playpoint should cause the player to start buffering and resume playback from that spot.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the Channel
AND plays an archived video stream (NOT LIVE)
AND fast forwards the stream
AND stops fast forwarding and attempts to play
custom_expected:
THEN the player will begin to buffer
AND the playback will begin at the selected point

title: Roku Requirements: Hitting the rewind button should cause the player to start REW
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Channel has been installed
custom_steps:
WHEN the Channel is accessed
AND an archived video stream is accessed (NOT LIVE)
AND the stream has played for at least a minute
AND the user presses the rewind button
custom_expected: THEN the media should start to rewind

title: Roku Requirements: All 3 levels of REW should work
custom_steps:
WHEN the Channel is accessed
AND an archived video stream is played (NOT LIVE)
AND the video stream has been playing for several minutes
AND the user presses rewind multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the rewind speed should increment accordingly up to the 3 levels

title: Roku Requirements: Once REW has stopped selecting a playpoint should cause the player to start buffering and resume playback from that spot
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the Channel
AND plays an archived video stream (NOT LIVE)
AND rewinds the stream
AND stops rewinding and attempts to play
custom_expected:
THEN the player will begin to buffer
AND the playback will begin at the selected point

title: Roku Requirements: In channels that support continuous audio during navigation in the channel verify that moving about the channel does not negatively effect playback or distort audio.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the Channel
AND launches an Audio stream
AND navigates to other areas of the Channel
custom_expected:
THEN the audio playback is not negatively impacted
AND the audio is not distorted

title: Roku Requirements: In channels that support continuous audio during navigation verify that starting a new audio stream correctly ceases the current stream and starts playing the new one.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the Channel
AND launches an Audio stream
AND starts a different stream while the first stream is playing
custom_expected:
THEN the first stream will stop
AND the second stream will begin

title: Roku Requirements: Content purchased in the channel should be playable/usable immediately
custom_steps:
WHEN the Channel is accessed
AND the user has performed an In App Purchase
custom_expected: THEN the purchased content should be playable/usable immediately

title: Roku Requirements: The channel must not crash or hang
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the Channel
AND navigate throughout the different areas
custom_expected:
THEN the Channel will not crash
AND the Channel will not hang when moving to different areas

title: Roku Requirements: The channel should not prevent the screensaver from activating over its regular UI. Disabling the screensaver for video, gameplay and other uses is fine and expected.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Channel is installed
AND the user has accessed the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN the user is not on a video
custom_expected: THEN the Roku screensaver should activate accordingly after the set period of time

title: Roku Requirements: All remote buttons not actively used in the application should not affect user input if accidentally or intentionally pressed during application usage.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Channel is installed
AND the user has accessed the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses a remote control button that's function is not applicable to the screen
custom_expected: THEN no action should be taken in the application

title: Roku Requirements: The time from launching a channel to the first usable screen appearing should be under 30 seconds.
custom_steps: WHEN the user accesses the Channel
custom_expected: THEN the landing page should load within 30 seconds

title: Roku Requirements: Any action that commonly takes more than 3 seconds should display a 'loading' or 'retrieving' screen.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Channel is installed
AND the user has accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN an action is taken
AND the action takes longer than 3 seconds
custom_expected: THEN a 'loading' or 'retrieving' screen will display

title: Roku Requirements: Verify that the channel can be removed from the Roku.
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to uninstall/remove the Channel from the Roku
custom_expected: THEN the uninstall/removal will be successful

title: Roku Requirements: Verify that the channel survives a reboot of the Roku player without issue.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user restarts the Roku player
AND the Roku player starts back up
custom_expected: THEN the Channel can still be accessed without issue

title: Roku Requirements: Verify that Network interruptions do not cause the application to crash or hang, they should be handled gracefully.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Channel has been installed
AND the user accesses the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN the network connection drops
AND the network connection recovers
custom_expected:
THEN the application will not drop
AND the application will not hang
AND the Channel will recover gracefully

title: Roku Requirements: If the channel being tested is an update to an existing channel verify that updating does not remove activation/linking or any saved data like high scores or level unlocks.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Channel is installed
AND there is existing user data stored (activating/linking)
AND there is an update available
custom_steps: WHEN the update is applied
custom_expected:
THEN the existing user data will not be erased
AND the user's activation/linked account will still exist/function upon the update's completion

title: Roku Requirements: Verify that hitting the Home button during any function in the application immediately shows the Roku home screen.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Channel is installed
AND the user is currently in the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN the home button on the remote control is pressed
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought back to the Roku home screen

title: ***Roku Requirements: The channel needs to do IP filtering if its content is restricted by region.
***Roku Requirements: The channel should not be available in channel stores for regions it does not support.
